name: Education for everyone
short_description:
The project aims to                                                      1. Allow professionals, teachers, and trainers from al over the world to share their teaching, training, and professional experience in education, so all those interested in education will benefit from
2. Allow all learners to gain insight about methods, tools, and strategies in teaching and learning so as to help them educate themselves and become self learners.
3. Help educational agencies and departments, whether government, private, or NGO's to support educational services , consultation, and support all over the world
summary: A project that allows all interested in educational services to share
